HcoZVjy9T_xA1156OwbVUw.text: The food here is great! Every now and then I start missing American food and this place is about as close to home as I've found in Singapore. Service has improved but is still a little lacking in the speed and friendliness departments. Don't let that keep you from checking it out though. Its definitely worth a try!

RIZHOUN5uAlBzbOM-b1UEw.text: Awful. Only way to describe it, the $16 "homemade" mojitos were sickeningly sweet, and $2 more then I paid at universal studios of all places (and weaker), when I asked them for my second one less sweet I got soda water with no sweetness. I ordered the cheddar burger with bacon for dinner, the burger came out sans bacon and with a slice of American Processed Cheese slice that they claimed was cheddar. When confronted they admitted this was a cheese slice product and not actual cheddar, they got my bacon and offered to replace the cheese, I declined as I have discovered they don't remake your food here just repair it so I scraped it and ate a little bit. Not the wait staffs fault and they were attentive and pleasant but over all a terrible dining experience.

NfhYb-FQUucQd_OD9h4llA.text: Dan Ryan's is a good size restaurant plenty of seating and has a bar area as well.  Typical American food options some are better than others but a place o come from time to time to get My American food fix.  The waitstaff are always friendly and helpful.

ZBSBPGgXYTYzR8ThyHtCTw.text: I've been a fan of Dan Ryan's since '91 at the original when I lived in HKG.  It's also been a tradition during the times I've lived in HKG and SIN over the years to have Thanksgiving dinner there with turkey and the trimmings.  However, this year for some reason they changed the menu and NO TURKEY!!  That just doesn't set well with me.  On top of that, both the ham and salmon were overcooked and dry.  The pumpkin cheese cake (not pie) had no flavor whatsoever.  Frankly, I've noticed this location going down hill in food quality the last couple of times I've been there.  Since I'll be leaving SIN next month, this was my last time to Dan Ryan's, but even if it wasn't it still would have been my last time.

l9Xr5dzhfKVclKjNaWfs5w.text: I expected a lot when I visited, and had middle class stake. The stake was dry and not as tender add I expected.  It is a nice clean restaurant so I hope to try some other menu next time.悪くはないのですが、これといって格別に美味しいお店ではないですね。肉をウェルダンにしたのが失敗だったかもしれませんが、相方が頼んだミディアムレアもまあ普通でした。暫くは行かないかと思います。2015/11

VnbBOhFZWyjFO-1Ws3lZ0w.text: Best place in Singapore for breakfast and a bloody mary :)

photos.caption: Photo of Dan Ryan's Chicago Grill - Singapore, Singapore. Bloody Mary

c_7siLzVVEYqVSdZhUa5PA.text: If you are an American this place pretty much sucks. Do not order the steak for sure.  The tbone wax paper thin so it was well done when though I ordered medium rare.  Replaced with filet but tasted odd...avoid

gWxZ8y3qGQNYTGg4ON7W3g.text: American Food. American sized portions. Singapore  standard of wait service. It's a shame really as the food was pretty tasty. The Bloody Mary was excellent. But as soon as the food was out, the server disappeared.

_3cIyPcvA7I-sOMryN10UQ.text: Probably the best style of American cuisine on the island. They put a lot of effort into the way it looks and feels inside as if you are actually going to a middle to high end American chain steakhouse. Ok, clearly this is a novelty place for Europeans and Americans to go live it like they were back in the states. By no means should they you expect a Morton's or a Ruths Chris. If you did please exit this conversation. ABSOLUTE BEST TIME TO GO  is on Super Bowl Sunday (well for Singapore is Monday morning). American School kids, executives, and anyone that likes the NFL will be there in the wee hours of the morning watching the game, eating a hearty breakfast of steak, eggs, and other food. Drinking mimosas, bloody marys and beers. When I was in high school I remember getting blotto and then showing up with a note that was clearly fake. Then the receptionist puts it on top of a huge stack of other clearly fake notes regarding a convenient doctors appointment or whatever. oh, the hilarity. I am a fan because of the memories I get when I go there.

2HoM8CJ_NJI9moTytBbUKg.text: Dan Ryan's is a good place to go for some authentic American food. Portions are American sized and their menu has a nice variety of different American dishes. Go for their hamburger or baked ziti. On Thanksgiving, they have a traditional American meal of turkey, mashed potatoes, stuffing and sides. They also have a nice daily set lunch, which is satisfying for the price.

photos.caption: Photo of Dan Ryan's Chicago Grill - Singapore, Singapore
